services.name: GST Registration & Filing
services.text: Complete GST registration process and monthly/quarterly filing for eCommerce sellers

services.name: Bookkeeping & Accounting
services.text: Professional bookkeeping services tailored for online marketplace sellers

services.name: Income Tax Returns
services.text: Expert preparation and filing of income tax returns for individuals and businesses

services.name: Marketplace Reconciliation
services.text: Detailed reconciliation of sales data from Amazon, Flipkart, and other platforms

services.name: Payment Gateway Integration
services.text: Setup and management of payment gateways with proper accounting integration

services.name: Business Registration
services.text: Complete business setup including company registration and licensing

banners.heading: Focus on Sales — We’ll Do the Books
banners.text: Focus on growing your online business while we handle your books, taxes, and compliance. Specialized services for Amazon, Flipkart, and other marketplace sellers.

banners.heading: ✨ We are hiring!
banners.text: GPMJ & Associates, Indore, is looking for CA Interns to join our team. If you know someone who might be a good fit, your referrals would be highly appreciated.
highlights: Duration: Articleship as per ICAI requirements

OurTeam.description: CA Arpit Paliwal, Partner at GPMJ & Associates, brings 14+ years of expertise in auditing, taxation, and startup advisory. He helps businesses scale through financial structuring, compliance, and strategic consulting.
